error SwapCallFailed(address target, bytes4 funSig, bytes reason)

event BridgeStarted(bytes indexed transactionId, address indexed user, bytes receiver, string bridge, address bridgeAddress, address from, bytes to, uint256 amount, uint256 destinationChainId, bytes destinationCalldata)

event DZapBatchTokenSwapped(bytes indexed transactionId, address indexed sender, tuple(string dex, address callTo, address recipient, address fromToken, address toToken, uint256 fromAmount, uint256 returnToAmount)[] swapInfo)
event DZapBridgeStarted(bytes indexed transactionId, address indexed user, address indexed integrator)

event DZapTokenSwapped(bytes indexed transactionId, address indexed sender, tuple(string dex, address callTo, address recipient, address fromToken, address toToken, uint256 fromAmount, uint256 returnToAmount) swapInfo)

function bridge(bytes _transactionId, bytes _feeData, bytes _feeVerificationSignature, uint256 _deadline, tuple(address token, uint256 amount, bytes permit)[] _erc20Token, tuple(address recipient, address from, address to, uint256 fromAmount, uint256 minToAmount, bool updateBridgeInAmount)[] _swapData, tuple(string dex, address callTo, address approveTo, bytes swapCallData, bool isDirectTransfer)[] _swapExecutionData, tuple(address adapter, bytes adapterData)[] _adapterInfo) payable

function bridge(bytes _transactionId, bytes _feeData, bytes _feeVerificationSignature, bytes _batchDepositSignature, uint256 _deadline, tuple(tuple(address token, uint256 amount)[] permitted, uint256 nonce, uint256 deadline) _tokenDepositDetails, tuple(address recipient, address from, address to, uint256 fromAmount, uint256 minToAmount, bool updateBridgeInAmount)[] _swapData, tuple(string dex, address callTo, address approveTo, bytes swapCallData, bool isDirectTransfer)[] _swapExecutionData, tuple(address adapter, bytes adapterData)[] _adapterInfo) payable

function bridge(bytes _transactionId, bytes _feeData, bytes _feeVerificationSignature, uint256 _deadline, tuple(address token, uint256 amount, bytes permit) _intputTokens, tuple(address recipient, address from, address to, uint256 fromAmount, uint256 minToAmount, bool updateBridgeInAmount) _swapData, tuple(string dex, address callTo, address approveTo, bytes swapCallData, bool isDirectTransfer) _swapExecutionData, tuple(address adapter, bytes adapterData) _adapterInfo) payable

function bridge(bytes _transactionId, bytes _feeData, bytes _feeVerificationSignature, uint256 _deadline, tuple(address token, uint256 amount, bytes permit) _intputTokens, tuple(address adapter, bytes adapterData) _adapterInfo) payable
